1: Here, you can view your opponents, the tiles they control, their cards, and their army size.
2: The initial phase is the supply phase, during which you must distribute all your cards to the tiles you control according to your chosen strategy.
3: Once all troops have been deployed, proceed to the next phase.
4: The second phase is the attack phase. Click on one of your tiles and an adjacent enemy tile to open the attack planning panel.
5: In the final phase, you can strategically reposition your troops between your owned tiles.
6: If you control an entire region, you'll receive additional troop reinforcements every turn.
7: This is the log window, where you can track game events. Hover over underlined text for additional details.
8: Each turn, conquering a territory earns you a card. Combine three cards for extra troops just before the deployment phase. You need to use them when you have five cards.
